name: Fun Block Brick Puzzle
description:
Challenge your brain with a new simple block brick game 2020. You will love it at the first times you play. Classic gameplay but new feature – ten ten style block will make you spend hours to play it.

FEATURES
- New designed style – 10x10 block free game. Instead of 8x8 block, now the grid of this block puzzle game will have 10x10 block.
- Classic but stunning graphics brick design.
- No time limit. You can play this brick block puzzle 2020 continuously for hours.
- It’s free, suitable for all ages and genders.

HOW TO PLAY
- It’s so simple – Drag the blocks to create a line
- Combine the brick blocks in order to destroy the lines before the grid is out of space.
- You can’t rotate the blocks so that think carefully before arrange them.
This free ten ten brick block is so easy and fun. Let’s train your brain with addictive brick block puzzle game now!
